Detail.insult: INSULT nickname Generates a random insult and throws it at the target user. The insult database was borrowed and modified from the Perl Acme-Scurvy-Whoreson-BilgeRat-Backend-insultserver module: http://search.cpan.org/dist/Acme-Scurvy-Whoreson-BilgeRat-Backend-insultserver/
